plot: A faithful adaptation of the Edgar Allan Poe story about subjectivity, in which a man believes he sees a hideous monster approaching his home. He actually is viewing a sphinx moth outside his window.
title: The Sphinx
plot_es: A faithful adaptation of the Edgar Allan Poe story about subjectivity, in which a man believes he sees a hideous monster approaching his home. He actually is viewing a sphinx moth outside his window.
